mapper.select: SELECT C.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM `comment` AS C INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON C.memberId = M.id WHERE (C.relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode} AND C.relId = #{relId}) OR (C.relTypeCode = 'comment' AND C.relId IN (SELECT id FROM `comment` WHERE relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode} AND relId = #{relId})) ORDER BY C.parentId ASC, C.id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (memberId, body, relTypeCode, relId, parentId, regDate, updateDate) VALUES (#{loginedMemberId}, #{body}, #{relTypeCode}, #{relId}, #{parentId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE `comment` SET `body` = #{body}, updateDate = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
